con:interface.name: Smartbear Calculator
con:interface.con:description: A simple calculator for internal consumption Backend Repository - Front End Repository -

con:part.con:content: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"description":"A simple calculator for internal consumption","version":"2.0.0","title":"Smartbear Calculator","contact":{"email":"math.whiz@smartbear.com"},"license":{"name":"Apache 2.0","url":"http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"}},"paths":{"/status":{"get":{"summary":"Smoke call.","description":"Validate the API is alive","responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","example":"Running"}}}}}}},"/add":{"post":{"summary":"Add two numbers together.","operationId":"addInput","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"inputOne","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"inputTwo","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successful operation.","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/resultAdd"}},"404":{"description":"Bad input.","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/error"}}}}},"/subtract":{"post":{"summary":"Subtract inputOne from inputTwo.","operationId":"subtractInput","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"inputOne","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"inputTwo","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successful operation.","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/resultSubtract"}},"404":{"description":"Bad input.","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/error"}}}}},"/multiply":{"post":{"summary":"Multiply inputOne and inputTwo.","operationId":"multiplyInput","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"inputOne","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"inputTwo","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successful operation.","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/resultMultiply"}},"404":{"description":"Bad input.","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/error"}}}}},"/divide":{"post":{"summary":"Divide inputOne into inputTwo.","operationId":"divideInput","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"inputOne","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"inputTwo","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successful operation.","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/resultDivide"}},"404":{"description":"Bad input.","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/error"}}}}}},"definitions":{"resultAdd":{"type":"object","required":["result"],"properties":{"result":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","example":4}}},"resultSubtract":{"type":"object","required":["result"],"properties":{"result":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","example":0}}},"resultMultiply":{"type":"object","required":["result"],"properties":{"result":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","example":16}}},"resultDivide":{"type":"object","required":["result"],"properties":{"result":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","example":1}}},"error":{"type":"object","required":["message"],"properties":{"message":{"type":"string","example":"Error in request"}}}},"x-aws-api-id":"0yujjrhfpi","host":"virtserver.swaggerhub.com","basePath":"/nathansAPIs/smart-calculator/2.0.0","schemes":["https","http"]}
